subject: Re: Not Just Quizzes: News is gaining on Facebook,too
body:
On Feb. 21, at 04:06 PM, Julia Turner wrote:
We should look hard at optimizing the news quiz for Facebook.


On 2/20/15, 9:19 AM, "Stahl, Jeremy" wrote:

>Interesting. I haven't looked at the Feb. 14 vs. Jan. 15 numbers, but I
>wouldn't be surprised if we're growing at similar rates to the groups they
>analyzed. I wonder if there's a way to make our quizzes more shareable.
>Maybe the key is to give people a non-tacky rank, title, and description
>once they complete a quiz and ask them to share it, like BuzzFeed does
>after their "quizzes," but less lame.
>
